name: Super Orbital Mega Drift
description:
Super Orbital Mega Drift is one of my first games, made in three weeks with nothing but my laptop. The story ain't good and the game is way too hard, but you can cheat by pressing tab to skip levels, shift to shoot infinitly or alt to gain infinite lives !

Made in GMS2, I don't have a paying account anymore so I can't update it or anything... this was actually kind of a test version. Oh well !

pink
